snippet: Dani Pedrosa, on a Honda, took the pole position for Sunday’s Catalunya MotoGP in Montmelo, Spain.
lead_paragraph: Dani Pedrosa, on a Honda, took the pole position for Sunday’s Catalunya MotoGP in Montmelo, Spain.

headline.main: Honda Rider Earns Pole in Spain
headline.print_headline: Honda Rider Earns Pole in Spain
